Celeste was a cleric of Sel√ªne living in Neverwinter in the late years of the 15 century DR.
In 1479 DR, Celeste took part in the Siege of Neverwinter. She rescued Xuna from being killed by an undead horde outside of the city walls before she herself was rescued by a counter-attack led by Sergeant Knox. Together, the three of them defeated a powerful undead warrior before meeting Valindras army at the head of a force of Neverwinters defenders.
